artist: Jack Larsen; Jack Lenor Larsen Inc.; Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Twill weave, vertical and horizontal stripes in different colors that emphasize the twill pattern. Twill weave with slight striped effect. Variety of oranges in warp & weft. Stapled to 8x10,5" card with 99.1.1185.7. "H-8A" written on card (oranges)
title: Pomegranate
